resources.string:
Add/Remove lane

Add lanes by clicking the plus sign.
Remove the last lane by pressing the minus sign. Removing last lane is done without any warnings so remember to save your results before removing lanes.

Share

Swimtimer app can share your results by mail or you can save your results to your internal drive for later access.

In the overflow menu you can share your results. When stop is clicked on any lane a result for all lanes is prepared for sharing.

Edit lane names

It\'s possible to enter names for the different lanes. If no names are entered then Lane 1, Lane 2, etc will be used.
"Closing will stop timers and reset list."

Swimtimer app

With Swimtimer app you can record split times for several athletes while keeping track of individual results! \'Swipe\' left or right to see split times or change lane labels.

Start timing with \'Start all\' or \'Start\' and record each athletes split time by clicking \'Split\', on final lap use \'Stop\' to record the final split time.
The \'Base\' stopwatch is always started if a start button is clicked to keep track of total time since first start. Clicking \'Split\' will record a split time and show that last split time for 2.5 seconds before continuing with the new lap.
\'Stop all\' will stop the timers for all lanes/athletes but will not record a final split time for individual lanes.
\'Clear\' will reset all data for a lane and reset the timer.

One

Swimtimer\'s \'One\' screen is simulating a manual stopwatch with one button for start and split times and no lanes. Hold the split button for a bit longer to create a separator.

Incremental mode

Swimtimer has a special mode, \'Incremental timing\', to keep track of swimmers starting with a couple of seconds delay, ie when swimming in the same lane. Use the same button to start and record split times as each swimmer completes a lap. Switch mode through menu.
Swimtimer One shows a main timer that keeps track of total time, the latest split time are shown in the timer below the main timer. To the left all split times are listed.
By \'long\'-clicking on the Split button a divider is created and added to the split times list.
